scripts.babel-build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --extensions '.ts,.tsx,.jsx' --ignore 'src/lib/**/*.test.tsx' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored
scripts.build-publish: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --extensions '.ts,.tsx,.jsx' --ignore 'src/lib/**/*.test.tsx' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored && npm publish
scripts.build-publish-start-demo: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src/lib --out-dir dist --extensions '.ts,.tsx,.jsx' --ignore 'src/lib/**/*.test.tsx' --copy-files --no-copy-ignored && npm publish && rm -rf demo/node_modules && cd demo && npm install && npm start
scripts.start-demo: cd demo && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm start
